<https://twitter.com/mdneuzerling|@mdneuzerling>: :writing_hand::skin-tone-2: Machine Learning Workflows with Julia
I wanted to learn how to create machine learning models with Julia, so here’s my experience using Julia‘s MLJ package. A great API and a mature piece of software. <https://mdneuzerling.com/post/machine-learning-workflows-with-julia/>
attachments.text:
:writing_hand::skin-tone-2: Machine Learning Workflows with Julia
I wanted to learn how to create machine learning models with Julia, so here’s my experience using Julia‘s MLJ package. A great API and a mature piece of software. <https://mdneuzerling.com/post/machine-learning-workflows-with-julia/>

text: MLJ is a pleasure to use. Thanks to <@UD0SQV5LL> and <@UAZP7LJLU> for helping me understand the finer details of MLJ’s evaluation strategies.
